entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AuthenticationState doesn't update in Blazor SSR when user is signed out #49631
  • Dotnet/aspnetcore #49630
  • Equivalent to LocalRedirect in Blazor #49628
  • C# Dev Kit for VS Code missing controller based API project template. #49617
  • Net 6.0 access HttpContextAceesor.HttpContext is null #49616
  • Test Collection Cleanup Failure #49615

Closed

  • Stealth #49629
  • Provide a solution for sharing authentication state of a user in a Blazor application with client #49626
    8.0-rc1
  • On Android platform .NET Maui App referencing NuGet Package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.JwtBearer 6.0.5 does not build #49569
  • DPAPI and Antiforgery failture in Razor Pages #49525
  • BUG ROLES IN RAZOR PAGE (Blazor) #49590
  • Using Blazor for the error handling results in "no submit handler was found with that name" error when dealing with post requests #49576
  • Add ability to generate PIN instead of long tokens when trying to generate confirm email token or change password token. #49607

PullRequests

Created

  • Javiercn/unified blazor routing #49622
    area-blazor

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2229244 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Support for X-Forwarded-Prefix in ForwardedHeadersMiddleware #49249
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Tweak AddRazorPages trimming warning. #49377
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make DataProtectionKey props virtual #49604
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Fix text field generator with explicit value. #49608
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Draft: Support null values in Results/TypedResults #49588
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add a .http file to WebAPI project template #49561
    area-mvc, community-contribution
